data.title: Peter Gilmore dies at the age of 81
data.meta_description: Actor Peter Gilmore, who was popularly known for â€˜The Onedin Lineâ€™, has died
data.text:
Actor Peter Gilmore, who was popularly known for â€˜The Onedin Lineâ€™, has died

17:23 07 February 2013

British actor Peter Gilmore has died in London aged 81-years-old following an illness, according to reports. The man was well-known for the BBC programme ‘The Onedin Line’ where he played the character Captain James.

As well as his part in the show, which began in 1971 and lasted for a decade, Peter also starred in the hit ‘Carry On’ films.

A spokesperson said, as reported by the Daily Mail: "On behalf of his wife Anne and Peter's family I would like to thank those who have sent their kind thoughts and condolences."

Peter, who was originally from Germany, also featured in the likes of ‘Doctor Who’.
